html:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Grand City Properties SA, Nexi SpA and SGL Carbon SE, on Wednesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Grand City Properties SA GYC.DE: Barclays cuts to equal weight from overweight

* Mj Gleeson Plc GLEG.L: Peel Hunt raises to buy from hold

* Nexi SpA NEXII.MI: Stifel raises to buy from hold

* SGL Carbon SE SGCG.DE: HSBC raises to hold from reduce

* SNP Schneider Neureither & Partner SE SHFG.DE: Berenberg raises to buy from hold


Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* A.G. Barr BAG.L: Barclays raises target price to 517p from 500p

* Abrdn Plc ABDN.L: HSBC raises target price to 330p from 300p

* Accor ACCP.PA: Credit Suisse raises target price to EUR 24.1 from EUR 22.4

* Adecco Group AG ADEN.S: Credit Suisse cuts target price to CHF 56 from CHF 58

* Admiral ADML.L: Barclays raises target price to 3061p from 3059p

* Adyen NV ADYEN.AS: Goldman Sachs cuts target price to EUR 2,900 from EUR 3,300

* Aegon NV AEGN.AS: ING initiates coverage with buy rating; target price EUR 6.25

* Akzo Nobel NV AKZO.AS: ING cuts target price to EUR 110 from EUR 125

* Allianz SE ALVG.DE: Barclays raises target price to EUR 240 from EUR 235
